At Phantom Food Finder, we believe that you have a right to know where your food is coming from. After all, nobody wants to think they ordered from a new family pizza place, only to find out it's coming from a "Cheesy Chuck's Pizzeria".

That's why we created our Google Chrome extension, which seamlessly integrates with Grubhub, DoorDash, Postmates, and Uber Eats to automatically identify legitimate restaurants in your area. Our app uses the Google Places API to analyze each restaurant's name and location, and if we find a match, we'll add a badge to the restaurant title with a tooltip confirming that the kitchen is "Ghost-Free".

If we can't verify then we warn you that you might be ordering from a ghost kitchen. We'll add a "Haunted" badge to the title with a tooltip listing other businesses in the area that could be using the ghost kitchen's brand name to trick you. 

With Phantom Food Finder, you don't have to worry about fake restaurants ruining your meal. Our app runs automatically in the background, so you don't have to do a thing – just browse your favorite meal delivery app and let us take care of the rest. And if you ever have any questions, our tooltips include a link to the restaurant's location on Google Maps, so you can verify our analysis with just a click.

Don't get tricked by ghost kitchens – try Phantom Food Finder today and enjoy peace of mind with every meal delivery!
